meanings.definition: The act or process of constructing with timber.
meanings.sent1: The timberings of the new house were carefully crafted by skilled workers.
meanings.sent2: The timberings for the bridge were delivered to the construction site.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the timberings to build a tiny fort in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The timberings of the ship held strong against the raging storm.
meanings.sent5: The sweet smell of fresh timberings filled the air as the cabin took shape.

meanings.definition: The materials used in constructing with timber.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter selected high-quality timberings for the furniture project.
meanings.sent2: The timberings were stacked neatly in the lumberyard, ready for use.
meanings.sent3: The children built a small house out of cardboard boxes and pretend timberings.
meanings.sent4: The old barn was supported by sturdy timberings that had weathered many years.
meanings.sent5: The timberings were varnished to enhance their natural beauty in the cabinetry.
